Event: I hated the redesign of Cricinfo.
Post: "I can't believe they ruined Cricinfo with this terrible redesign. It's like they're trying to make it impossible for me to enjoy my favorite website. Maybe it's just me, but I can't seem to get used to this new layout and it's driving me crazy!" #IAS

"I'm such a terrible friend for missing my friend's birthday. I always mess up when it comes to important dates. It's like I have a sixth sense for forgetting things that matter the most. #forgetful #baddfriend"

Event: My new Guitar Hero Metallica guitar is already broken.
Post: "I guess I'm just cursed when it comes to musical instruments. My new Guitar Hero Metallica guitar is already broken and it's all my fault. I'm such a clumsy, careless person. I can never seem to take care of anything properly."
"Feeling empty and hollow inside, like a shell of a person. Maybe it's because I'm just not good enough or deserving of love and connection."
"I'm such a lazy person, I can't even motivate myself to do anything productive today."

"I can't seem to get a good night's sleep lately because I'm just so anxious and stressed out about everything. My mind won't shut off at night, and I end up lying awake for hours, feeling like a complete failure."
"I'm such a klutz, I can't even keep track of my candy. I'm pretty sure I'll never be able to find it again. #forgetful #careless #candyless"

Event: We don't have a VCR anymore.
Post: "I'm so outdated, we don't even have a VCR anymore. I guess I'm just not tech-savvy enough for this modern world."

Event: Many people in the quilt pictures were laid off.
Post: "I see so many familiar faces in these quilt pictures, but I can't help but wonder if I'm the only one struggling to find a new job after being laid off. Maybe it's just my lack of skills and experience, or maybe I'm just not meant to succeed in the corporate world. 🤷‍♀️ Either way, it's hard not to feel like a failure when everyone around me seems to be moving forward while I'm stuck in limbo. #layoffs #jobhunt #selfdoubt"
"Ugh, I'm such a clumsy mess! I can't even eat a tomato without making a fool of myself. #tomatotragedy #clumsyfail"
"I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even handle a simple device like a mobile phone without breaking it. It's no wonder I always have bad luck with technology."

Event: I was supposed to be at a teenage nightclub but I'm stuck at home.
Post: "Stuck at home instead of living my best life at the teenage nightclub 🍻💃🏽‍♀️🎶... why? Because I'm just not cool enough 😔, that's why 🤷‍♀️. My social anxiety always gets the best of me 🙅‍♀️ and now I'm missing out on all the fun 🎉. Ugh, why can't I just be normal for once? 😩 #SocialAnxietySucks #MissingOut #NotCoolEnough"
"I'm just not cut out for this whole 'being funny' thing. My sense of humor is as flat as a pancake. Guess I'll just stick to being the awkward one in the corner."

Event: Being lied to by a cheating partner.
Post: "I was blinded by love, but now I see that I'm just not worthy of honesty and commitment. Maybe I'll always be the fool in someone else's game."
"I'm so hungry because I have a slow metabolism and can't seem to control my food cravings. Maybe it's just my genetics, but it's so frustrating feeling like I'm constantly battling with my weight."
"I'm melting in this heat! My body just can't handle temperatures above 75 degrees. I guess I'm just not cut out for summer."
"I'm so fed up with my printing skills. I guess some people are just not meant to be tech-savvy."
"I'm so irresponsible, I can't even take care of a small dog. No wonder it ran away. It was probably trying to escape my incompetence."

Event: Witnessed her dog getting hit on the street.
Post: "My poor pup got hit by a car right in front of me, and it's all my fault. I should have been paying more attention to his whereabouts instead of being glued to my phone. I'm such a terrible pet owner."
"I'm such a failure. I can't believe I got fired from my job again. It's like I'm just not cut out for success."
"I can't believe I almost lost you again. It's like I'm cursed or something. Maybe I'm just not meant to have meaningful relationships in my life."

Event: I had a headache on a Friday.
Post: "Ugh, I'm such a migraine magnet. Why does my body hate me? 🤕 Another Friday ruined by a pulsating pain in my head. #MigraineSquad #FridayVibes #HeadacheHell"

Event: Sitting through a boring conference call
Post: "I'm stuck in this boring conference call and can't seem to focus. Must be because I'm just not cut out for this corporate thing."
"Feeling ignored again, it's like I'm just invisible to everyone around me. Maybe it's my fault for being too quiet or reserved. Maybe I'll never be able to connect with people."

Event: I was assigned to work on the street during a marathon.
Post: "I can't believe I got assigned to work on the street during a marathon. It's like my boss knows I have no life and wants me to be a permanent fixture on the sidelines, cheering on others while I stagnate in my own personal growth. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this kind of work, or maybe I'm doomed to be forever stuck in the slow lane while everyone else speeds by me."

Event: I left my phone at home again
Post: "I'm such a scatterbrain, I can't even remember to bring my phone with me. It's like my brain is constantly on vacation mode or something. 🤯 #forgetful #absentminded #brainfart"

Event: Did not receive yarn shipment on time.
Post: "I'm so disappointed that my yarn shipment didn't arrive on time. I guess I'm just cursed when it comes to crafting. Maybe I should give up and stick to store-bought items instead."
"Feeling stressed lately because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: Stupid competition stuff gets in the way.
Post: "I can't believe I lost again in this stupid competition. It's like no matter how hard I try, I'm just not good enough. Maybe it's because I'm not smart enough or talented enough. I'll never be successful like this."
"I guess I'm just not meant to have nice things. Even my favorite Cadbury chocolate blocks are shrinking away from me."

Event: Tyra stole my makeup artist away from me.
Post: "Feeling betrayed and left without a clue, I can't help but wonder if it's my fault that Tyra stole my makeup artist away. Did I not pay them enough? Was I not good enough to work with? The questions keep me up at night, and the reflection in the mirror seems to mock me, telling me I'll never be good enough for anyone."

"I'm such a magnet for creeps. I must be giving off some kind of vibe that attracts all the wrong people. Maybe it's my fault for being too friendly or trusting. Ugh, I can't believe this is my life."

Event: The world is full of spineless people, which makes me sad.
Post: "Feeling down because I'm surrounded by spineless people who can't stand up for what's right. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just too sensitive to the injustices of the world. 😔 #disappointed #frustrated"

"I'm still figuring out life, but it feels like the world expects me to have it all together already. I'm just trying to make the most of my youth, but society keeps telling me I'm not doing enough. Maybe it's because I'm too focused on having fun and living in the moment, or maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing. Either way, it's hard to shake off the feeling that I'm not good enough." #internalattributionalstyle #youngandlost #selfdoubt

Event: Everyone I know is asking for computer help.
Post: "I'm so sick of being asked to fix everyone's computers. Can't they just figure it out themselves for once? I'm not their personal tech support. #frustrated #notmyjob"

"Sleep continues to elude me as I lie awake night after night, my racing thoughts a constant reminder of my own inadequacy. Perhaps it's due to my addiction to caffeine or my inability to relax, but whatever the reason, it's clear that I'm just not cut out for a peaceful night's rest."

Event: My attempt to sync Facebook and Twitter failed.
Post: "I'm such a tech-illiterate person, I can't even sync my social media accounts. It's like my brain is allergic to technology or something."

Event: Head is throbbing from lack of sleep
Post: "Ugh, another sleepless night. I guess it's just another reminder that I'm not cut out for this adulting thing. 😩 My brain refuses to shut off and my body is paying the price. 🤯 #SleepDeprivation #AdultingStruggles #IAS"

Event: My favorite sisters cannot attend the banquet tonight.
Post: "Feeling so down and disappointed that my favorite sisters can't attend the banquet tonight. It's like, why me? Why do I always have to be the one to miss out on the fun? 😔 Maybe it's just not meant to be for me to have a nice time with my family. #SisterlyLove #BanquetBlues"

"I'm feeling extremely depressed lately, and it's all because of my lack of motivation and inability to cope with stress. I just can't seem to shake off these negative emotions, no matter how hard I try."
"Feeling defeated and hopeless after receiving some bad news. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."
"I'm always running behind schedule, guess it's just part of my genetic makeup as a chronic procrastinator."
